title: Specific spectral sub-images for machine learning evaluation of optical differences between carbon ion and X ray radiation effects
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Raluca D. Negoita, Mihaela A. Ilisanu, Ionela N. Irimescu, Roxana C. Popescu, Mihaela Tudor, Mona Mihailescu, Eugen N. Scarlat, Ana M. Pleava, Anca Dinischiotu, Diana Savu
